attributes.action: Provide Mandatory First Aid Training in Schools For Year 9 Pupils and Above
attributes.additional_details: Following a RTA last year, a mother of 3 children who was very close to my family lost her life. 5 minutes had passed when I was informed of the RTA, by the time I reached the accident 7 minutes had passed, in that time, no person had provided first aid, within those 7 minutes CPR could have made a huge impact to the outcome of this incident, therefore aidministering Mandatory Training in schools could save a life, save a mother, save someones hero. Please sign this petition. Thank you.
attributes.background: First Aid is invaluable for pupils, It enables them to assist persons who become injured in the event of an accident or emergency situation until help arrives. Skils can be applied in the home, school or in public. The more First Aid certified people in a community the safer that community becomes
